meanings.sent1: She misdialled her friend's number and ended up talking to a stranger.
meanings.sent2: I often misdialled when using the old rotary phone.
meanings.sent3: After she misdialled for the third time, she realized she needed new glasses.
meanings.sent4: His fingers seemed to have a mind of their own as they misdialled repeatedly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the misdialled number echoed in her ears, a reminder of her mistake.

meanings.definition: Made an error in dialing a telephone number.
meanings.sent1: He quickly realized he had misdialled the emergency number and apologized.
meanings.sent2: She misdialled the pizza delivery number and ended up with Chinese food instead.
meanings.sent3: The cat must have misdialled the phone, as it was now meowing into the receiver.
meanings.sent4: The misdialled number glared back at her from the screen, mocking her mistake.
meanings.sent5: The misdialled call left a sense of unease, as if something was not quite right.
